MicrosoftInternetExplorer4
Honeywell Aerospace Trading requests the pleasure of your company at the MRO Europe 2014.
Join our Honeywell Aerospace Trading team to discover the latest Honeywell news and to learn more about how our technologies enable our customers to realise the Possibilities of Supply. Made Easy. Dates:
Conference: October 7-9, 2014 Exhibition Hall: October 8-9, 2014
Venue: IFEMA, Madrid, Spain Stand: 1518 RSVP: yann.lepage@honeywell.com <mailto:yann.lepage@honeywell.com>
Celebrating 100 Years of Innovation. This year marks a significant milestone in our history as Honeywell Aerospace celebrates 100 years of innovation, dedication and excellence.
